channel.title: Easier Way to Change IP to VPS or Localhost

item.title: Easier Way to Change IP to VPS or Localhost
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

This is just an easier way to set your client to run on VPS or localhost IPs. Its pretty easy to implement this fully, as I am only giving you the ternary string and boolean.

[code=java]/**
* True = connect to local host False = connect to VPS
*/
public static final boolean LOCALHOST = true;

public static final String VPS_IP = "Your_Vps_IP";

public static final String SERVER = LOCALHOST ? "localhost" : VPS_IP;[/code]

Its simple really, but it saves you some time to live your life a few seconds longer.

Read full topic
item.source: Easier Way to Change IP to VPS or Localhost
